text: Bengt Olov Emanuel "Julle" Gustavsson (13 January 1928 - 16 February 2017) was a Swedish footballer and manager. He played as a defender. He played for IFK Norrköping, Atalanta and Åtvidabergs FF. He also played for the Sweden national football team during the 1958 FIFA World Cup. He was born in Ringarum, Östergötland County. Gustavsson died on 16 February 2017 in Norrköping, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Swedish football managers Category:Swedish footballers
title: Bengt Gustavsson
